traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The miremal can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Swamp Camouflage
traits.desc: The miremal has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.

traits.name: Savage Move
traits.desc: If the miremal surprises a creature, it gets a bonus action it can use on its first turn of combat for a claw attack, a bite attack, or a Bog Spew attack.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The miremal makes two attacks, one of which must be a claw attack.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Bog Spew (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The miremal spews a noxious stream of bog filth mixed with stomach acid at a target up to 20 feet away. Target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or be blinded for 1d4 rounds.

actions.name: Muddled Escape (1/Day)
actions.desc: If an attack would reduce the miremal's hit points to 0, it collapses into a pool of filth-laden swamp water and its hit points are reduced to 1 instead. The miremal can move at its normal speed in this form, including moving through spaces occupied by other creatures. As a bonus action at the beginning of the miremal's next turn, it can reform, still with 1 hit point.
